Workman Enron:
What are you doing here? You aren't hunt the alligators? or maybe you didn't listen me...
Go to Alligator Island, kill the followings mobs: Alligator, Crokian Lad, Dailaon Lad, Crokian Lad Warrior, Farhite Lad, Nos Lad, until you’ve collected:
30x Alligator Leather.
20x Blue Alligator Leather.
10x Bejeweled Alligator Leather.
